channel.title: Progressive House (CRASH)
channel.description: So I haven’t made any house music for a while and thought i’d give a go at progressive house. Not sure where i’m going with it. Let me know if you have any feedback on what i have so far. https://app.auxy.co/projects/he40MqmI-KBW9_3NB3SPig==

item.title: Progressive House (CRASH)
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
If you’re going for a prog house sound, I recommend you crank that puppy up to the classic 128BPM.

Also, pluck chords and/or pads. Makes it sound a bit fuller and also emotional.

Aside from that, sounds good so far, imo.

Read full topic
